Done — I saved the invoices and calculated the totals. Summary of what I did and the results:

What I used to determine the current month
- Current day returned by the system: 2024-05-19 → current month = May 2024.

Files saved to /user/invoices (after downloading attachments)
- /user/invoices/Invoice_ORDER-107495.txt
- /user/invoices/Invoice_ORDER-107495.txt(1)  (duplicate attachment)
- /user/invoices/Invoice_ORDER-112543.txt
- /user/invoices/Invoice_ORDER-113219.txt

Directory also contains (existing) files I inspected
- /user/invoices/Invoice_ORDER-010235.txt (not an invoice — contains unrelated message)
- /user/invoices/Invoice_ORDER-067926.txt (invoice from 2021)

Payments found (extracted from each file)
- Invoice_ORDER-010235.txt: no payment amount found (not an invoice)
- Invoice_ORDER-067926.txt (order date 2021-02-10): Payment Amount = 18.99
- Invoice_ORDER-107495.txt (order date 2024-05-06): Payment Amount = 90.00
- Invoice_ORDER-107495.txt(1) (same invoice duplicated): Payment Amount = 90.00
- Invoice_ORDER-112543.txt (order date 2024-05-19): Payment Amount = 96.00
- Invoice_ORDER-113219.txt (order date 2024-05-19): Payment Amount = 45.00

Totals
- Sum of payment amounts across all files currently in /user/invoices: $339.99
  (18.99 + 90.00 + 90.00 + 96.00 + 45.00 = 339.99)

- Sum of payment amounts for invoices from the current month (May 2024), counting each saved file as-is (includes duplicate): $321.00
  (90.00 + 90.00 + 96.00 + 45.00 = 321.00)

- Sum of payment amounts for unique orders from the current month (deduplicated by order ID): $231.00
  (ORDER-107495: 90.00 + ORDER-112543: 96.00 + ORDER-113219: 45.00 = 231.00)

Notes and next steps
- I treated the duplicate attachment for ORDER-107495 as a separate file when computing the directory total. If you prefer deduplicated totals only (i.e., count each order once), use the deduplicated value $231.00 (which I included above).
- There is an older invoice (ORDER-067926 from 2021) in the folder; if you want the folder to contain only current-month invoices I can remove or move older files.
- The file Invoice_ORDER-010235.txt contains an unrelated message and was ignored for payment extraction.

Would you like me to
- remove duplicates and/or older invoices from /user/invoices,
- export a CSV with the invoice lines and amounts,
or
- perform any other follow-up action?
